file_content.text: R6-D0 = Imperial data + communications unit
R6-D0 = scanning // Identity = confirmed
Message = recorded // Playback = beginning
This is Darth Malgus. Your service to the Empire is commendable, but I send you this for one reason:
You survived the Dark Temple of Dromund Kaas. That marks you as possessing a rare... resilience, and I need such resilience today.
I warred against madmen and the spirits of the dead.
I endured where others fell.
Oh, Malgus... the spirit I found in the Dark Temple, even you wouldn't believe.
You don't know the half of it.
I went chasing terrorists, and found dead men controlling the living. I'd prefer to forget.
The Dark Temple was a horror.
I remember the temple. Usually I hunt the living--not the dead.
That was one strange job.
Playback = resuming
I survived a few things on Dromund Kaas. Some stand out more than others.
Not sure I remember that.
Dark Temple files = classified // Cross-reference keywords = Sith Lord + possession + Force-driven phenomenon
[Listen to the message]
The Jedi will attempt to intercept this message, so I must be brief. The Sith Order's past has resurfaced--and we are all in danger.
If you are able to assist, assemble your team at these coordinates. Be swift.
Playback = complete // Response = available?
Inform Darth Malgus I'm on my way to the rendezvous. Tell him I can face anything in store.
Tell him I'm coming.
Seems like bad news.
Further information = unavailable // Recommendation = immediate departure
Lord Malgus needs to learn I don't answer to him. Say nothing.
No response--let him wait.
Orders = received // Coordinates = transmitted
R6-D0 = Imperial data + communications unit
